comments: Presumably, the positions n such that a(n)=0 are the terms of A097074. - _Ivan Neretin_, Jul 06 2015
links: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5461
mathematica: a = {0, 1, 1}; Do[AppendTo[a, a[[n]] + a[[n - 1]]]; AppendTo[a, Abs[a[[-1]] - a[[-2]]]], {n, 2, 51}]; a (* _Ivan Neretin_, Jul 06 2015 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
